featured.text: That being said, I’m definitely a carnivore and prefer meat, but I don’t see anything wrong with choosing one of the fakey- fakey meaty things once in a while—just for a change.
A person who likes to others is definitely not easy to get along with.
Living in a highly _____ society, you definitely have to arm yourself with as much knowledge as possible.

definition.example: I will definitely attend the meeting tomorrow.
